1256400.name: Raiders Run
1256400.description:
Do you ever wish that you could find a game based completely around 1v1, 2v2 or 4v4 arena pvp combat!? Then look no further... Raiders Run is a multiplayer arena fighting game that takes advantage of skill based pvp and fun engaging combat mechanics.

Key Features

  • 1v1 Arena
  • 2v2 Arena [Coming Soon]
  • 8 Player FFA Arena l[Coming Soon]
  • Unranked Matches
  • Ranked Matches
  • Character Customization

Worlds

  • Paladin Arena [1v1]
  • Isle of the Abiding [Islands Will Include - Eternal Emporium, Training Grounds, Crystal Shrine Peninsula]

Combat

  • Melee | Type: Close Quarters | Moves: [2 Normal, 3 Power, 1 Super] Damage Based on swing length and cool-down time.
  • Magic | Type: Ranged | Moves: [2 Normal]
  • Shield Block | In clutch situations when you have no time to consume a Healing Potion, fend off your opponent('s) with a damage -> healing transfer move
  • Healing Potion | Low on Health? Consume a Healing Potion and gain 75% Health back and continue your fight.
  • Backflip | Need to escape to pop a Healing Potion or rethink your plan? Use Backflip to quickly bounce-back out of tough situations
  • Roll | Out think your opponent('s) by quickly rolling into their zone before they can react.

We look forward to seeing you! We love feedback and will try to take suggestions to alter the gameplay into something that is fun and engaging to everyone!
1256400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
